User: Research suggests I can manage varied file sizes by segmenting and summarizing content, ensuring I absorb the necessary context effectively. This approach aligns with the priority on depth over speed, and my processing capabilities are well-suited to handle the dense material from 600 hours of collaboration.
Survey Note
